context.p: A backlog project within the Capacity Planner is intended to be a representation of a proposed project within the associated cloud pod. It references the deployment type that the user wishes to use this backlog project for, as well as the team that will be using it.
Create a new backlog project for the Capacity Planner

prereq.p: To create a new backlog project the user must have the following:

ul.li: Associated Team already created in the tool
Associated Deployment Type already created in the tool

info.p: Click the backlog project view from the nav bar at the top.
Click the Create new backlog project button
Enter the details in the fields.
NOTE: Restrictions on the fields are as follows:

ul.li: Team must be an existing team that the user has already created
Deployment Type must be an existing deployment type that that user has already created

info.p: Click the Save button and you will be redirected back to the previous page where you can see the newly created backlog project with options to edit and delete that backlog project.
NOTE: Backlog Project will not save if any fields are invalid (RED in UI)

result.p: A new Backlog Project is created in the Capacity Planner.
